channel.title: ---VregScape Version 3---
channel.description:
Hey im Vreg the owner & coder of VregScape.
The VregScape Version 3 feature's are: - New Client(With ScreenShot Maker And Music Player) - Dragon Boots - Dragon Full Helm - GodSword's - 3rd Age - SkillCape's - And Much More
Server Owner & Coder: Vreg. Download The VregScape Client Version 2 at www.vregscape.tk. Join our forums at www.vregscapeforums.tk. Go to our website at www.vregscape.tk.
VregScape Story:
There were two God's. The God Of Zamorak, he is the strongest God and he is evil. And The God Of Bandos, he is a good God. The two Gods are fighting eachother for thousand years. One time The Gods decided to make The Earth and people on it. The war isn't over yet. You have to fight for you God. The question is... Which God do you choose?
[IMG]http://i290.photobucket.com/albums/ll242/VregScapeOwner/ScreenShot3.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i290.photobucket.com/albums/ll242/VregScapeOwner/ScreenShot1.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i290.photobucket.com/albums/ll242/VregScapeOwner/ScreenShot2.jpg[/img]
